_comment: TA-Lib indicator default configurations for the Strategy Template Builder. Each entry maps to IndicatorDefinition fields used in StrategyTemplateBuilderDialog. 'inputs' lists required OHLCV fields. 'outputs' lists result series names. defaults.param1 = periodParam (1st arg), defaults.param2 = period2Param (2nd arg), defaults.param3 = param1 (3rd numeric arg). paramMeta keys use the same param1/param2/param3 naming.

Overlap Studies.label: Bollinger Bands
Overlap Studies.description: Upper / Middle / Lower Bollinger Bands around a moving average

Overlap Studies.label: Double Exponential Moving Average
Overlap Studies.description: Reduces lag of a standard EMA by applying EMA twice

Overlap Studies.label: Exponential Moving Average
Overlap Studies.description: EMA gives more weight to recent prices

Overlap Studies.label: Hilbert Transform - Instantaneous Trendline
Overlap Studies.description: Cycle-based adaptive trendline using Hilbert Transform

Overlap Studies.label: Kaufman Adaptive Moving Average
Overlap Studies.description: Adapts to volatility; fast in trending markets, slow in ranging

Overlap Studies.label: Moving Average
Overlap Studies.description: Generic moving average — MA type selectable (0=SMA, 1=EMA, 2=WMA, …)

Overlap Studies.label: MESA Adaptive Moving Average
Overlap Studies.description: Dual-output MAMA/FAMA based on Hilbert Transform phase

Overlap Studies.label: Moving Average with Variable Period
Overlap Studies.description: MA where each bar can have a different period

Overlap Studies.label: Midpoint Price over Period
Overlap Studies.description: (Highest high + Lowest low) / 2 over the period

Overlap Studies.label: Parabolic SAR - Extended
Overlap Studies.description: SAR with separate start/increment/max for long and short

Overlap Studies.label: Simple Moving Average
Overlap Studies.description: Arithmetic mean of prices over the lookback period

Overlap Studies.label: Triple Exponential Moving Average (T3)
Overlap Studies.description: Lower lag T3 with volume factor (vFactor) control

Overlap Studies.label: Triangular Moving Average
Overlap Studies.description: Double-smoothed SMA — weights peak in the middle of the window

Overlap Studies.label: Weighted Moving Average
Overlap Studies.description: Linearly weighted MA — most recent bar has the highest weight

Momentum Indicators.label: Average Directional Movement Index
Momentum Indicators.description: Measures trend strength (not direction); values above 25 = strong trend

Momentum Indicators.label: Average Directional Movement Index Rating
Momentum Indicators.description: Smoothed version of ADX: (ADX + ADX[period]) / 2

Momentum Indicators.label: Absolute Price Oscillator
Momentum Indicators.description: Difference between two MAs (fast – slow)

Momentum Indicators.label: Aroon
Momentum Indicators.description: Dual-line (AroonUp / AroonDown) identifying trend changes

Momentum Indicators.label: Aroon Oscillator
Momentum Indicators.description: AroonUp – AroonDown; positive = bullish bias

Momentum Indicators.label: Balance of Power
Momentum Indicators.description: (Close – Open) / (High – Low); positive = bulls in control

Momentum Indicators.label: Commodity Channel Index
Momentum Indicators.description: Measures deviation of typical price from its SMA; ±100 are key levels

Momentum Indicators.label: Chande Momentum Oscillator
Momentum Indicators.description: Modified RSI ranging from –100 to +100

Momentum Indicators.label: Directional Movement Index
Momentum Indicators.description: Raw directional movement before ADX smoothing

Momentum Indicators.label: MACD
Momentum Indicators.description: Moving Average Convergence/Divergence; 3 outputs: MACD, Signal, Histogram

Momentum Indicators.label: MACD with Controllable MA Type
Momentum Indicators.description: MACD where fast, slow and signal MA types are user-selectable

Momentum Indicators.label: MACD Fix 12/26
Momentum Indicators.description: Fixed-period MACD (fast=12, slow=26); only signal period is configurable

Momentum Indicators.label: Money Flow Index
Momentum Indicators.description: Volume-weighted RSI; above 80 = overbought, below 20 = oversold

Momentum Indicators.label: Minus Directional Indicator (-DI)
Momentum Indicators.description: Negative directional movement as a percentage; part of ADX system

Momentum Indicators.label: Minus Directional Movement (-DM)
Momentum Indicators.description: Raw negative directional movement before smoothing

Momentum Indicators.label: Momentum
Momentum Indicators.description: Price – Price[period]; raw price change over the lookback

Momentum Indicators.label: Plus Directional Indicator (+DI)
Momentum Indicators.description: Positive directional movement as a percentage; part of ADX system

Momentum Indicators.label: Plus Directional Movement (+DM)
Momentum Indicators.description: Raw positive directional movement before smoothing

Momentum Indicators.label: Percentage Price Oscillator
Momentum Indicators.description: (Fast MA – Slow MA) / Slow MA × 100; normalised APO

Momentum Indicators.label: Rate of Change
Momentum Indicators.description: ((Price / Price[period]) – 1) × 100

Momentum Indicators.label: Rate of Change Percentage
Momentum Indicators.description: (Price – Price[period]) / Price[period]

Momentum Indicators.label: Rate of Change Ratio
Momentum Indicators.description: Price / Price[period]

Momentum Indicators.label: Rate of Change Ratio ×100
Momentum Indicators.description: (Price / Price[period]) × 100

Momentum Indicators.label: Relative Strength Index
Momentum Indicators.description: Oscillator 0–100; above 70 = overbought, below 30 = oversold

Momentum Indicators.label: Stochastic
Momentum Indicators.description: Classic Slow Stochastic: %K and %D lines

Momentum Indicators.label: Stochastic Fast
Momentum Indicators.description: Fast Stochastic: unsmoothed %K and %D

Momentum Indicators.label: Stochastic RSI
Momentum Indicators.description: Stochastic applied to RSI values; fastK and fastD outputs

Momentum Indicators.label: TRIX
Momentum Indicators.description: 1-day ROC of a triple-smoothed EMA; zero-line crossovers signal momentum

Momentum Indicators.label: Ultimate Oscillator
Momentum Indicators.description: Weighted average of three oscillators (short/mid/long) to reduce false divergences

Momentum Indicators.label: Williams' %R
Momentum Indicators.description: Inverse stochastic; –80 to –100 = oversold, 0 to –20 = overbought

Volume Indicators.label: Chaikin A/D Line
Volume Indicators.description: Accumulation/Distribution Line; uses close location within high-low range

Volume Indicators.label: Chaikin A/D Oscillator
Volume Indicators.description: EMA(3) – EMA(10) of the A/D Line

Volume Indicators.label: On Balance Volume
Volume Indicators.description: Cumulative volume that adds on up-days and subtracts on down-days

Cycle Indicators.label: Hilbert Transform - Dominant Cycle Period
Cycle Indicators.description: Instantaneous period of the dominant cycle in price

Cycle Indicators.label: Hilbert Transform - Phasor Components
Cycle Indicators.description: InPhase and Quadrature components of the dominant cycle

Cycle Indicators.label: Hilbert Transform - SineWave
Cycle Indicators.description: Sine and Lead Sine components for cycle identification

Cycle Indicators.label: Hilbert Transform - Trend vs Cycle Mode

Volatility Indicators.label: Average True Range
Volatility Indicators.description: Smoothed average of true range; measures volatility in price units

Volatility Indicators.label: Normalized Average True Range
Volatility Indicators.description: ATR as a percentage of close price; comparable across instruments

Volatility Indicators.label: True Range
Volatility Indicators.description: Raw true range before smoothing (no lookback parameter)

Pattern Recognition.label: Two Crows
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish two-candle reversal pattern after an uptrend

Pattern Recognition.label: Three Black Crows
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish three-candle pattern of consecutive long black candles

Pattern Recognition.label: Three Inside Up/Down
Pattern Recognition.description: Three-candle confirming reversal within prior bar range

Pattern Recognition.label: Three-Line Strike
Pattern Recognition.description: Four-candle pattern: three trending candles followed by a reversal bar

Pattern Recognition.label: Three Outside Up/Down
Pattern Recognition.description: Three-candle engulfing reversal with confirming third bar

Pattern Recognition.label: Three Stars In The South
Pattern Recognition.description: Bullish pattern of three candles with narrowing bodies and shadows

Pattern Recognition.label: Three Advancing White Soldiers
Pattern Recognition.description: Bullish three-candle pattern of consecutive long white candles

Pattern Recognition.label: Abandoned Baby
Pattern Recognition.description: Rare three-candle gap reversal; requires penetration percent param

Pattern Recognition.label: Advance Block
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish three-candle weakening pattern in an uptrend

Pattern Recognition.label: Belt-hold
Pattern Recognition.description: Single-candle pattern opening at its extreme then reversing

Pattern Recognition.label: Breakaway
Pattern Recognition.description: Five-candle pattern signalling reversal of trend

Pattern Recognition.label: Closing Marubozu
Pattern Recognition.description: Candle with no shadow on the closing side; strong directional signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Concealing Baby Swallow
Pattern Recognition.description: Bullish four-candle recovery pattern from downtrend

Pattern Recognition.label: Counterattack
Pattern Recognition.description: Two-candle reversal where second bar closes at prior close

Pattern Recognition.label: Dark Cloud Cover
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish two-candle pattern penetrating into prior white candle's body

Pattern Recognition.label: Doji
Pattern Recognition.description: Open and close are virtually equal; market indecision

Pattern Recognition.label: Doji Star
Pattern Recognition.description: Doji gapping away from prior candle; potential reversal

Pattern Recognition.label: Dragonfly Doji
Pattern Recognition.description: Doji with long lower shadow and no upper shadow; bullish signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Engulfing Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Second candle fully engulfs the body of the first; strong reversal signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Evening Doji Star
Pattern Recognition.description: Three-candle bearish reversal with doji at top

Pattern Recognition.label: Evening Star
Pattern Recognition.description: Classic three-candle bearish reversal at top

Pattern Recognition.label: Up/Down-gap Side-by-Side White Lines
Pattern Recognition.description: Two white candles after a gap; continuation signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Gravestone Doji
Pattern Recognition.description: Doji with long upper shadow and no lower shadow; bearish signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Hammer
Pattern Recognition.description: Small body at top with long lower shadow; bullish reversal signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Hanging Man
Pattern Recognition.description: Hammer shape after uptrend; bearish reversal signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Harami Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Small second candle entirely within the body of the first

Pattern Recognition.label: Harami Cross
Pattern Recognition.description: Harami where the second candle is a doji; stronger reversal signal

Pattern Recognition.label: High-Wave Candle
Pattern Recognition.description: Candle with very long upper and lower shadows; market uncertainty

Pattern Recognition.label: Hikkake Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Trap / false breakout pattern; inside bar followed by reversal

Pattern Recognition.label: Modified Hikkake
Pattern Recognition.description: Variation of the Hikkake requiring wider outside bar

Pattern Recognition.label: Homing Pigeon
Pattern Recognition.description: Bullish two-candle pattern: small black bar inside larger black bar

Pattern Recognition.label: Identical Three Crows
Pattern Recognition.description: Three Black Crows variant: each bar opens at prior close

Pattern Recognition.label: In-Neck Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish continuation: second bar closes near prior low

Pattern Recognition.label: Inverted Hammer
Pattern Recognition.description: Small body at bottom with long upper shadow; bullish reversal signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Kicking
Pattern Recognition.description: Two opposite Marubozu candles with a gap between them

Pattern Recognition.label: Kicking by Length
Pattern Recognition.description: Kicking pattern where the longer Marubozu determines bull/bear direction

Pattern Recognition.label: Ladder Bottom
Pattern Recognition.description: Bullish five-candle reversal after downtrend

Pattern Recognition.label: Long Legged Doji
Pattern Recognition.description: Doji with very long upper and lower shadows; extreme indecision

Pattern Recognition.label: Long Line Candle
Pattern Recognition.description: Single candle with unusually long body; strong momentum bar

Pattern Recognition.label: Marubozu
Pattern Recognition.description: Candle with no shadows; complete dominance by one side

Pattern Recognition.label: Matching Low
Pattern Recognition.description: Two consecutive candles closing at the same low; support signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Mat Hold
Pattern Recognition.description: Bullish five-candle continuation after a gap up

Pattern Recognition.label: Morning Doji Star
Pattern Recognition.description: Three-candle bullish reversal with doji at bottom

Pattern Recognition.label: Morning Star
Pattern Recognition.description: Classic three-candle bullish reversal at bottom

Pattern Recognition.label: On-Neck Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish continuation: second bar closes at prior low

Pattern Recognition.label: Piercing Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Bullish two-candle reversal: second bar closes above midpoint of first

Pattern Recognition.label: Rickshaw Man
Pattern Recognition.description: Long-legged doji with body at the exact center

Pattern Recognition.label: Rising/Falling Three Methods
Pattern Recognition.description: Five-candle continuation pattern: three small bars within two large bars

Pattern Recognition.label: Separating Lines
Pattern Recognition.description: Continuation: two consecutive bars opening at same level

Pattern Recognition.label: Shooting Star
Pattern Recognition.description: Small body at bottom with long upper shadow after uptrend; bearish signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Short Line Candle
Pattern Recognition.description: Single candle with a very short body; low volatility signal

Pattern Recognition.label: Spinning Top
Pattern Recognition.description: Small body with equal upper and lower shadows; indecision

Pattern Recognition.label: Stalled Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish three-candle pattern of diminishing white candles in uptrend

Pattern Recognition.label: Stick Sandwich
Pattern Recognition.description: Bullish: black candle enclosed between two black candles at same close

Pattern Recognition.label: Takuri (Dragonfly Doji long lower shadow)
Pattern Recognition.description: Dragonfly Doji with exceptionally long lower shadow; strong bullish reversal

Pattern Recognition.label: Tasuki Gap
Pattern Recognition.description: Three-candle continuation with a gap partially filled by opposite bar

Pattern Recognition.label: Thrusting Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish continuation: second bar closes just below prior midpoint

Pattern Recognition.label: Tristar Pattern
Pattern Recognition.description: Three consecutive doji candles; reversal or continuation

Pattern Recognition.label: Unique 3 River
Pattern Recognition.description: Rare bullish three-candle bottom reversal

Pattern Recognition.label: Upside Gap Two Crows
Pattern Recognition.description: Bearish: gap-up white candle followed by two black candles closing the gap

Pattern Recognition.label: Upside/Downside Gap Three Methods
Pattern Recognition.description: Five-candle continuation: gap followed by three candles and a close in the gap

Statistic Functions.label: Beta
Statistic Functions.description: Correlation of price to a reference series; measures systematic risk

Statistic Functions.label: Pearson's Correlation Coefficient
Statistic Functions.description: Linear correlation (r) between two price series over the period

Statistic Functions.label: Linear Regression
Statistic Functions.description: End-point of the least-squares regression line over the period

Statistic Functions.label: Linear Regression Angle
Statistic Functions.description: Angle (degrees) of the regression line; positive = uptrend

Statistic Functions.label: Linear Regression Slope
Statistic Functions.description: Slope of the regression line; positive = uptrend strength

Statistic Functions.label: Standard Deviation
Statistic Functions.description: Rolling standard deviation; proxy for volatility

Statistic Functions.label: Time Series Forecast
Statistic Functions.description: Next-bar projection of the linear regression line

Math Operators.label: Add
Math Operators.description: Element-wise addition of two price series

Math Operators.label: Div
Math Operators.description: Element-wise division of two price series

Math Operators.label: Highest Value over Period
Math Operators.description: Rolling maximum close over the lookback period

Math Operators.label: Index of Highest Value
Math Operators.description: Bar index of rolling maximum; useful for lookback detection

Math Operators.label: Lowest Value over Period
Math Operators.description: Rolling minimum close over the lookback period

Math Operators.label: Lowest and Highest over Period
Math Operators.description: Returns both min and max arrays for the period

Math Operators.label: Indexes of Lowest and Highest
Math Operators.description: Returns both minIdx and maxIdx arrays

Math Operators.label: Mult
Math Operators.description: Element-wise multiplication of two price series

Math Operators.label: Sub
Math Operators.description: Element-wise subtraction of two price series

Math Operators.label: Summation
Math Operators.description: Rolling sum over the lookback period
